name: World Obesity Federation
goal: World Obesity Federation represents professional members of the scientific, medical and research communities from over 50 regional and national obesity associations. Through our membership we create a global community of organisations dedicated to solving the problems of obesity. Our mission is to lead and drive global efforts to reduce, prevent and treat obesity.
interests: Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives:
Founding member and participant in the EU Platform on Diet, Physical Activity and Health.
Consortium member of several EU-funded research projects.
Recipient of an Operating Grant from the EU's 3rd Health Programme.
